entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: susan
entities.description: A student who is trying to cast spells, but struggling with 'Splinching'.

entities.name: t wycross
entities.description: The teacher who is giving instructions and encouragement to the students.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, accompanying T Wycross out of the Hall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, asking him about his progress in casting spells.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student who is teasing Ron and Harry about their lack of progress.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as indicated by Ron's question to Harry about his progress in casting spells.
T Wycross is accompanied out of the Hall by Professor McGonagall, as mentioned in the text.
Hermione teases Harry about his lack of progress in casting spells, as indicated by her smirking and comment about his trainers being too small.
Hermione also teases Ron about his lack of progress in casting spells, as indicated by her comment about his trainers being too small.
